basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was created by Dr. Brian Lamb and will support Instrumental Music Education students studying in the School of Music, with preference given to non-traditional students. Doug Fallis was a non-traditional student who came back to school after many years on the road as a drummer for a rock band, he wanted to finish his music-ed degree and become a band director. He went on to become an incredible band director at a school in Del City and turned a Junior High Band into a sweepstakes program. This scholarship was started to honor Doug and to help non-traditional music-ed students who want to return to school and become teachers. Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
